LanguageData.USAC_LetterTextOutpostExpired: The target outpost has relocated. The operation [resolvedQuestName] has been canceled.
LanguageData.USAC_LetterTextOutpostFailed: The target outpost has detected your approach and dispersed. The operation [resolvedQuestName] has failed.
LanguageData.USAC_LetterTextPayment: You have eliminated the target outpost!\n\nUSAC has sent the agreed compensation from [asker_faction_name].
LanguageData.USAC_OpportunitySite_OutpostRaid.USAC_Si: root(priority=1,sitePart==USAC_NeutralOutpost)->there's an outpost at the site guarded by (*Threat)[enemiesCount] [enemiesLabel](/Threat)
root(priority=1,sitePart==BanditCamp)->there's a bandit camp at the site guarded by (*Threat)[enemiesCount] [enemiesLabel](/Threat)
root(priority=1,sitePart==Outpost)->there's an enemy outpost at the site guarded by (*Threat)[enemiesCount] [enemiesLabel](/Threat)
